response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your success. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you stands at $15,000. My offer to you is to acquire this product at a special price of $13,000, capturing the essence of its true value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. This opportunity is exclusive to you, and I trust it aligns well with your strategic goals and budget considerations. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your endeavors further. Should you require any additional information or have questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our proposition.", "product_price": 13000}
